Package pamViewFX.fxNodes.utilsFX

Class ControlField<T>

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.HBox
pamViewFX.fxNodes.PamHBox
pamViewFX.fxNodes.utilsFX.ControlField<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
DualControlField
public class ControlField<T> extends PamHBox
Convenience class. Often used in dialogs. A label, text field and label again.
Author:
Jamie Macaulay

  • Constructor Details

    • ControlField

      public ControlField(javafx.scene.control.Label label1, javafx.scene.control.Label label2)
      Create a control field which has a text input field
      Parameters:
      label1 - - the name of the control label.
      label2 - - the units of the control label.

    • ControlField

      public ControlField(String label1, String label2)
      Create a control field which has a text input field
      Parameters:
      label1 - - the name of the control
      label2 - - the units of the controls

    • ControlField

      public ControlField(String label1, String label2, double minValue, double maxValue, double stepSize)
      Create a control field which has a spinner.
      Parameters:
      label1 - - the name of the control .
      label2 - - the units of the controls.
      minValue - - the minimum allowed value of the spinner
      maxValue - - the maximum allowed value of the spinner.,
      stepSize - - the step size.
